review: Great idea, horrible execution. Everything buffers - I mean everything. I'm surprised I didn't read more about that in the Amazon Reviews, because once I started having an issue and looking into it more I found that it seemed to be a common problem. There is a forum on Amazon with hundreds of questions/concerns regarding this matter and not ONE response from Amazon. Very unfortunate, because I was excited about this product. Printing off the return label as we speak and will be purchasing the Apple TV.
